divs: sighting detailsmy son and i were heading home from work at around 12:10 am on tuesday november 8th, 2011. as we were traveling on us hwy 42 west my son spotted the object in the sky at about a 45 degree angle from his seat in the vehicle. i then turned on old us hwy 42 and stopped my vehicle, rolled down the window to see if i could hear anything, which i did not. from my vantage point, the ufo had a red outline in the shape of a "v", and i noticed a bright yellowish\orange glow from what appeared to be the bottom of the object. the glow almost looked like fire, but i did not see any sparks or trail, and it seemed to pulsate from yellow to an orangish color. i continued down the road and turned into the condominium residence where i live. my son pulled out his cell phone to take a picture but for whatever reason he could not focus on the object. we continued to observe the object traveling northwest until we couldn't observe it anymore.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Florence
There were no other sightings in Florence on or around November 8th 2011
